data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Srisonchai, Ruttapon, Enghoff, Henrik, Likhitrakarn, Natdanai, Panha, Somsak (2018): A revision of dragon millipedes I: genus Desmoxytes Chamberlin, 1923, with the description of eight new species (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Paradoxosomatidae). ZooKeys 761: 1-177, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.761.24214, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.761.24214
